description.grayText: Increase reach. Create a community. Increase sales. All this

description.row1: An ebook that brings you INSTANT value - specific, realistic, functional, and attractive content that will refresh your brand and bring new followers to your page.
description.row2: You know what they say... "e;Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day, teach him to fish and he'll eat every day."e;
description.row3: Well, we decided to teach you how to fish...for new followers! You're getting not only 30 specific topics for social media content, but also lasting inspiration and way of thinking for the future.

desc.grayText: - total beginners and professional experts. applicable to every business!
